msg: Lazy lookup to avoid duplicate lookup

author: joerg
msg: unfortunately a caching JSPGenerator was a fast shot in the wrong direction,
the caching should be content or event based or ask the servlet for "valid or not valid"

msg: Check for valid session. Fixes exception running in Tomcat:
